thread.title: John Baillie
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by John Baillie

author: John Baillie
title: John Baillie
text: I showed up one day early for my appointment and rather than send me away Tom and Kevin took me right in. They went over different options and actually saved me money rather than pleasure me into things I did not need. These guys are the best and very professional
